Identity.History: The Sacred Band was a group of elite troops dedicated to the service of Tanit, patron goddess of Carthage. In addition to providing crack troops, the unit trained Carthaginians aspiring to command Punic mercenary armies. Specially picked troops carried the unit standard emblazoned with the symbols of the goddess into battle.
Identity.Tooltip: Champion Infantry Pikeman. Bonused vs. Melee units. Poor vs. Ranged units.
